thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Mavis Hedrik
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Mavis Hedrik

author: Mavis Hedrik
title: Mavis Hedrik
text:
The car was fair and reasonable for the price.
The service at the office and the young man who collected me at the airport was pretty good.
My only hiccup was the booking slip said collect at the airport. That was misleading - nowhere can I see information telling me to call you too me collect me at the airport. My cellphone does not have global roaming - your colleagues at Hertz Rental Vars were very gracious and phoned you for me.
